system.description:
You have some gear you’ve picked up since becoming aware of the supernatural world, mostly stashed away in the trunk of your car or in a bag you carry with you.

When you go to your kit for some mundane gear—road flares, first aid kit, etc.—useful to the situation, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, the situation escalates while you’re trying to prepare—brace yourself!

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, you find something you can use that pretty much fits the bill.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you find something you can use that pretty much fits the bill.

On a 10+, it’s perfect; take +1 ongoing to putting it to use in the scene.
